attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: This is a literal garbage fire app - it makes no sense. It’s almost like it was made by a sociopath narcissist. So weird. It just revolves around itself and doesn’t let you interact at all. Terrible choice. Sad.

attributes.title: Wah wah
attributes.review: Awful just terrible app full of terrible things. Quite frankly the worst app ever and I’ve known a lot of apps, some would even say I know the best apps and this is not one of them.

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: This app took forever to download🧚🧚 the graphics are so bad it hurts my eyes to look at them and the content is a load of bs 🤮😴 10/10 would never support the creators of this app☺️🧚

attributes.title: This is a joke
attributes.review: I got this app, and when I opened it, it kept crashing, and then it made my phone shut off. Don’t get this app if you love your phone😞

attributes.title: Honest Dudu
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and right when I opened it, it built a wall around my phone like wth this app needs to be fixed if anything it needs to go.

attributes.title: Isyoumaderwhatt
attributes.review: Ugh I tried downloading this app it wouldn’t work that means the president is not there ya like it’s so not worth it me and my pet turtle tried to do it I wouldn’t do nothing at all so don’t download this stupid app 👁👄👁 💀💀😈😈

attributes.title: A bad app🤢🤮🤮🤮
attributes.review: The app makes my phone battery die more faster and it makes my phone turn off when I’m playing my game or something

attributes.title: JUST BAD
attributes.review: App doesn’t work. At all. It’s completely useless. I understand why there are so many bad reviews now. Had to delete it as soon as I downloaded it, don’t trust it.

attributes.title: Just WHY???
attributes.review: It’s a garbage app, honestly. I can’t believe how unpatriotic this app is, like if the point is to send a clear and powerful message to Americans then it just fails. I won’t bother with it. Absolute trash.

attributes.title: TAKE THIS OFF THE APP STORE!! Worst App!!!
attributes.review: This app took FOREVER to download. After it finally did my WHOLE PHONE CRASHED. Then my little sister opened the app and saw a inappropriate picture, which completely broke her into tears. This is outrageous!!🤮
